title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 FE $100 off, Lenovo Duet 5 OLED Chromebook $400, more
content:
All of today’s best deals include a $100 discount on the new Samsung Galaxy S21 FE. That’s alongside Lenovo’s Duet 5 OLED Chromebook at an all-time low and the brand’s Smart Clock 2 models from $45. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 FE $100 off, Lenovo Duet 5 OLED Chromebook $400, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung's new Galaxy S21 FE has received a $100 discount at Amazon, returning to all-time lows for only the second time from $600.
